scripts.dev: fastify start -l info app.js | pino-elasticsearch -H http://localhost --port=9200
scripts.doctor: clinic doctor --on-port 'autocannon -c 100 -d 5 localhost:3002' -- fastify start app.js
scripts.flame: clinic flame --on-port 'autocannon -c 100 -d 5 localhost:3002' -- fastify start app.js
scripts.bubbleprof: clinic bubbleprof --on-port 'autocannon -c 100 -d 5 localhost:3002' -- fastify start app.js
